segments.text: Would you like to mail it by air or sea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... How long will it take to mail things to the USA by air ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About 10 days . You can send it express mail if you need it faster . It will only take three or four days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to send it by express mail . The faster , the better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is the receipt , please keep it . Have a good day .
segments.speaker: S1
